title: PhyloVAE: Unsupervised Learning of Phylogenetic Trees via Variational Autoencoders
details: T Xie, H Richman, J Gao, FA Matsen IV, C Zhang - arXiv preprint arXiv:2502.04730, 2025
abstract: Learning informative representations of phylogenetic tree structures is essential for analyzing evolutionary relationships. Classical distance-based methods have been widely used to project phylogenetic trees into Euclidean space, but they are often …
